actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for daylight saving time on an extended basis, and for other purposes.
short_title: Daylight Saving Time Expansion Act of 1982

summary.text: Daylight Saving Time Expansion Act of 1982 - Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to start daylight saving time the first Sunday in March rather than the last Sunday of April. Continues a State's right to preempt such time changes. Directs the Federal Communications Commission to make necessary adjustments in the operation of daytime standard amplitude modulation broadcast stations.

titles.title: Daylight Saving Time Expansion Act of 1982
A bill to provide for daylight saving time on an extended basis, and for other purposes.
